content: your papa and your mama gave you a unique combination of their dna you are a composite of their genetic input this wee knitting pattern is the same it is a composite of the mud puddles and hine patterns combining the best aspects of each this free pattern is written for 8ply/dk weight yarn and to fit a newborn babe approx 3-4kg 7-9lb in weight with an approx chest circumference of 35cm the finished garment has 2 5cm of positive ease will measure 37 5cm if knit to gauge construction the pattern is constructed using a seamless top-down raglan method the sleeves are worked at the same time as the body in a delicate lace pattern and then finished before moving on to the body so once you cast off you simply need to sew in your ends and your knit is finished you will need to know how to knit basic lace backwards loop cast on and how to work in the round if you are not familiar with these techniques you may need to reference a knitting guide book or view videos on the internet if you need pattern support please visit my group 1 **newsflash there is now bigger versions of this pattern available quaintly comes in a fingering weight dk weight and worsted weight version and all 3 versions are sized to fit from newborn to approximately 10 years best value way to purchase is in the quaintly ebook 2 ** 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/pekapeka-design-studio 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/quaintly-ebook
